EmailTemplate.name: Blog Retraction 7/25.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Whoops! — Here’s the correct links to this week’s content
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Looks like the last email we sent you didn’t pull through our content. That’s our fault! Here is what we published last week to help you grow your business. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Looks like the last email we sent you didn’t pull through our content. That’s our fault! Here is what we published last week to help you grow your business.
- 14 Tips to Win Increasingly Discount-Hungry Back-to-School Shoppers <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/back-to-school-shopping-trends/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=marketo-email&utm_campaign=retraction-email]]>
- The Significance of Sneakers –– and a Definitive End to Toe Creases <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/definitive-end-toe-creases-socktips/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=marketo-email&utm_campaign=retraction-email]]>
If you have any questions, please reach out. Thanks and happy Monday! Best, Tracey Wallace, Managing Editor
